text:
Selena Gomez takes on a quartet of interacting roles in a mesmerizing new video for her new single “Bad Liar.”

In the video Gomez plays on the unspoken desires on the part of all four characters.

Gomez teamed up with director Jesse Peretz, Girls and Orange Is The New Black. The new video has been promoted as a film.

Watch the new “Bad Liar” below.
title: Selena Gomez Releases Epic ‘Bad Liar’ Music Video
